snippet.title: Merrie Melodies: Drifting Apart
snippet.description: Mac and Tosh sing a touching ballad about drifting apart. Watch more of The Looney Tunes Show on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Stick to My Guns
snippet.description: Yosemite Sam sings a country ballad about making bad decisions. Watch more of The Looney Tunes Show on Cartoon Network!
